content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ did you think this was a knit sweater pattern the pine crochet sweater pattern is worked entirely with crochet stitches this top-down try it on as you go crochet sweater is entertaining to work up and wear the modern crochet stitches create a wardrobe piece you will want to wear in fall and winter this pattern includes a **video tutorial** to guide you through the important steps of the pine crochet sweater pattern https //youtu be/7erqwzxcena 1 **pattern pack discounts** use code save10 for 10% off two patterns save15 for 15% off 3 patterns save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns cannot be combined with other offers **crochet hook ** size h 5mm or hook to obtain gauge size i 5 5mm hook for slip_stitch ribbing 2 **notions ** removable stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends scissors faux fur pom pom 3 **yarn ** wecrochet wool of the andes 4 worsted weight 100% peruvian highland wool 110 yds/100m 50g cadet color a 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 balls pampas heather color b 2 2 2 2 3 3 3 3 3 balls oyster heather color c 7 7 8 9 11 13 15 16 17 balls brava colors 5 image with dark green colorwork hunter white & dove heather **yardage ** extra small 1 250 yds 1 143m small 1 300 yds 1 188m medium 1 375 yds 1 257m large 1 450 yds 1 325m 1x 1 525 yds 1 395m 2x 1 650 yds 1 509m 3x 1 800 yds 1 646m 4x 1 950 yds 1 783m 5x 2 200 yds 2 011m **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain est st pat - established stitch pattern flo - front loop only single_crochet - single_crochet sc3tog - single_crochet three sts together ssc - split single_crochet st s - stitch es **gauge** 14 sts by 16 row = 4x4 in ssc sts 14 sts by 15 row = 4x4 in est st pat **measurements/sizes ** finished bust sizes extra small 32 81 cm small 36 91 cm medium 40 102 cm large 44 112 cm 1x 48 122 cm 2x 52 132 cm 3x 56 142 cm 4x 60 152 cm 5x 64 163 cm this garment has approx 4 10 cm of ease **skill level ** intermediate/advanced colorwork let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 6 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 7 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 8 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 9 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 10 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 11 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property
